MusicBrainz Java API

A Java port of the MusicBrainz API by leigh@ldodds.com.

See the package documentation for an introduction to the API.

Downloads

To build the API you need Ant and Jena 2

beta-2

  • musicbrainz-beta-2-src.zip -- full source
  • musicbrainz-beta-2-nolibs-src.zip -- full source, without Jena 2 libs
  • musicbrainz-beta-2-bin.zip -- binary distribution
  • musicbrainz-beta-2-nolibs-bin.zip -- binary distribution, without Jena 2 libs
  • musicbrainz-beta-2-javadoc.zip -- javadoc only, which is also online
See CHANGES.txt for a list of the revisions in this release.

beta-1

  • musicbrainz-beta-1-src.zip -- full source
